abstract.p: Sarah Burroughs retires as president and chief operating officer at Burrell Communications Group (S)

block.p: Sarah Burroughs, president and chief operating officer at the Burrell Communications Group in Chicago, has retired, the agency said, after 26 years at Burrell and 36 years in the advertising industry. Ms. Burroughs, 56, is one of the best-known top executives in the field of agencies that specialize in campaigns aimed at black consumers. No successor to Ms. Burroughs is being named at this time as Burrell considers changes in its management structure. Burrell is 49 percent owned by the Publicis Groupe S.A.
